name: Lilly's
summary:
A 2D game set in a fantasy town inspired by the 1700s France or Italy.

You play as Lilly, a young girl who is the owner of a butcher shop that sells very special types of meat. Every night Lilly goes out with the big butcher's knife to restock the shop, by murdering the citizens of the town.

Lilly has been left by herself and been through some gruesome events, she is trying to reach out to her mother. Writing letters to her, asking for help and support but also about what she is doing at night.

There are good and bad people in the town, like anywhere else. You need to keep a balance otherwise there will be consequences. You also need to be careful to not get arrested by the police, because what Lilly is doing is actually a crime.
